description:
Amid financial woes, UK universities are slashing academic jobs but splurging on 'woke' roles, offering bumper paychecks for positions in equality, diversity and inclusion.

The post Universities Axe Lecturers but Appoint ‘Woke’ Staff on £100K Salaries appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Universities Axe Lecturers but Appoint ‘Woke’ Staff on £100K Salaries

description:
A climate activist told his pregnant wife she can't have gas and air during labour because of the impact on the environment. Is this what the activists hope the eco-utopian future will hold? wonders Sallust.

The post No Gas and Air For Women Giving Birth in the Eco-Utopian Future appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: No Gas and Air For Women Giving Birth in the Eco-Utopian Future

description:
The NHS is revamping its transgender policies in hospitals, cracking down on terms like "chestfeeding" and prioritising clear language based on biological sex.

The post ‘Chestfeeding’ to Be Banned in NHS Crackdown appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: ‘Chestfeeding’ to Be Banned in NHS Crackdown

description:
The Newcastle fan given a three-season ban for saying 'transphobic' things on X, e.g. "transwomen aren't women", is taking legal action against the club with the help of the Free Speech Union.

The post Newcastle Fan Launches Legal Action Against Club and Premier League With Help of FSU appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Newcastle Fan Launches Legal Action Against Club and Premier League With Help of FSU

description:
VisitBritain has left many bewildered with its latest woke gobbledegook, substituting terms such as "man hours" with "person hours" in an attempt to be more inclusive.

The post Fury As ‘Out of Touch’ Tourism Agency VisitBritain Bans Words Including Blacklist, Walkthrough and Blindspot appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Fury As ‘Out of Touch’ Tourism Agency VisitBritain Bans Words Including Blacklist, Walkthrough and Blindspot

description:
We shouldn’t be too quick to dismiss Chris Packham's rechristening of the Daily Sceptic as the Daily Septic, says politics professor Dr James Alexander. After all, we deal with ideological sewage every day.

The post Should We Rename the Daily Sceptic the Daily Septic? appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Should We Rename the Daily Sceptic the Daily Septic?

description:
Now Reuters runs a 'fact check' of a Daily Sceptic Arctic sea ice story. Being accused of "cherry picking" by an outfit that urges journalists to claim climate change makes mangoes taste worse is beyond ridicule.

The post Reuters Joins BBC in Failed ‘Fact Check’ of Daily Sceptic Arctic Sea Ice Story appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Reuters Joins BBC in Failed ‘Fact Check’ of Daily Sceptic Arctic Sea Ice Story
